name: 應用統計方法（一）
description:
Applied Statistical Methods covers the fundamental understanding of statistical methods necessary to deal with a wide variety of practical problems.



Introduction  the importance of statistical analysis and data summarization
The fundamental principles of probability
Statistical tests of hypotheses; point and interval estimation 
Analysis of variance (ANOVA);  and analysis of covariance
Blocked designs; 
Factorial design
Simple and multiple Linear Regression(I)
Simple and multiple Linear Regression(II)
Simple and multiple Linear Regression(II)
The students are expected to use R for their homework and project.
goals: 能理解統計領域的相關理論
能應用統計領域的相關方法
能使用軟體進行統計分析
syllabus:
Applied Statistical Methods covers the fundamental understanding of statistical methods necessary to deal with a wide variety of practical problems.

1.  Introduction: the importance of statistical analysis and data summarization
2.  Analysis of association for numerical data and simple linear regression
3.  Statistical tests of hypotheses; point and interval estimation 
4.  Analysis of association for discrete data
5.  Analysis of variance (ANOVA)
6.  Analysis of Covariance (ANCOVA)
7.  Blocked designs; 
8.  Factorial design
9.  Multiple Linear Regression(I)
10.  Multiple Linear Regression(I)(II)
11.  Multiple Linear Regression(I)(II)
12.  Multivariate Analysis
13.  Time Series Analysis

The students are expected to use R for their homework and project.

methodologies.note: 講述統計的相關理論、方法與應用。
透過課堂討論協助學生了解與應用所學相關知識與技能。
提供學生合作學習的機會以完成小組分組作業及報告。
運用統計分析軟體輔助學習並提升學生的學習動機。
